tool_description: Verifies insurance coverage and obtains prior authorization for laboratory tests when required, ensuring proper billing and patient coverage.

test_codes.description: Array of test codes requiring authorization check

diagnosis_codes.description: ICD-10 codes justifying the laboratory testing

ordering_physician_npi.description: National Provider Identifier of the ordering physician

error_messages: Patient insurance not found: No active insurance information for this patient. Update insurance details.
Invalid test codes: One or more test codes are not recognized for authorization.
Invalid diagnosis codes: ICD-10 codes must be valid and current.
Invalid NPI: Ordering physician NPI is not valid or not found in provider network.
Authorization denied: Insurance has denied coverage for one or more requested tests.
Incomplete prior authorization: Required documentation missing for authorization request.
usage: Provide patient_id, test_codes, diagnosis_codes, and ordering_physician_npi to check authorization requirements. Set priority_level for urgent cases.

authorization_status.description: Overall authorization status: approved, denied, pending, not_required

authorized_tests.description: Test codes that have been authorized

denied_tests.description: Test codes that were denied authorization

authorization_numbers.description: Authorization reference numbers for approved tests

coverage_amount.description: Total dollar amount approved for coverage
